fullplot: Pooh, a bear of very little brain, and all his friends in the Hundred Acre Wood sing their way through adventures that encompass honey, bees, bouncing, balloons, Eeyore's birthday, floods, and Pooh sticks.
plot: A collection of animated shorts based on the stories and characters by A. A. Milne.
title: The Many Adventures of Winnie the Pooh

tomatoes.consensus: Perhaps the most faithful of Disney's literary adaptations, this cute, charming collection of episodes captures the spirit of A.A. Milne's classic stories.
